objective: Document specific real estate activities conducted without licenses

activities_documented.violation: Unlicensed person making lease decisions affecting tenancy

evidence: Legal terminology used (ADA, FHA, Fair Housing Act)

activities_documented.violation: Unlicensed person conducting property management activities
